ios.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/Moonlet.xcworkspace -scheme Moonlet_beta -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

ios.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/Moonlet.xcworkspace -scheme Moonlet -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
